string.name: aboutText
string.b: You can see various types of hotel with their detailed information like type of room, pictures of every room, cost per room per day etc. There is also a checkin checkout option that gives the extra facility. You can use the map in this app to get the location and direction of the hotels and also contact with hotel managers. Finally there will be found a booking option to book the desired hotel and you user will get the confirmation message.
